overview: An American pilot swears to get revenge on the German ace who shot his brother in this war movie set in war-torn Europe. Montgomery is the pilot. After he sees his brother die while trying to parachute to safety, Montgomery's plane is shot down over Germany. He is placed in a POW camp. There he meets a Russian medic and a Czech. Together the trio escapes.
tagline: A fighting, flying Yank and a brave Russian girl... united by danger and love in the war's most daring ESCAPE!
title: Bomber's Moon
